parameters.query:
INSERT INTO business_processes_states (business_process_id, company_id,n8n_workflow_execution_id,n8n_workflow_root_execution_id, started)
SELECT MAX(business_process_id), $2,$3,$4, NOW()
FROM public.business_processes
WHERE n8n_process_name = $1;
update business_processes_states set finished=NOW() where  n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1
select cs.service_name,cs.service_description,cs.service_id,c.company_name from companies c, company_services cs where c.company_id=cs.company_id and c.company_id=$1

update business_processes_states set tokens_used=$3,tokens_used_type=$4 where business_process_id=(select MAX(business_process_id) from business_processes where n8n_process_name=$1) and n8n_workflow_execution_id=$2

WITH next_batch AS (
    SELECT key_word_id
    FROM key_words
    WHERE company_id=$1 
	and is_relevant is null 
	and resolution_type <> 'in_progress'
    ORDER BY key_word_id asc
    FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED
    LIMIT $2
)
UPDATE key_words t
SET resolution_type = 'in_progress'
FROM next_batch nb
WHERE t.key_word_id = nb.key_word_id
RETURNING t.*
update business_processes_states set steps_total=$2 where  n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1
update business_processes_states set steps_passed=$2, tokens_used=0 where n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1
update business_processes_states set steps_total=steps_total+$2 where  n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1
update business_processes_states set steps_passed=$2, tokens_used=0 where n8n_workflow_execution_id=$1
